Tower Hamlets Local Plan 189 PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES 14.111 While active frontages are encouraged, there will always necessarily be some inactive spaces within a development, and these are considered in part 1(f). Some of these inactive spaces may be useful facilities, such as waste or bike storage, and consideration should therefore be given to how safe and well-lit routes can be provided to allow access to and from these spaces, while also ensuring that items like bins do not block walkways, entrances, or sightlines.
